name: Accidental Test Launch
description:
"Shoot for the moon. If you miss, you'll land among the stars PANIC!"

This is a co-op game in the same vein as Keep Talking And Nobody Explodes.

After accidentally launching past the moon into a wormhole, you find yourself alone somewhere in space in a ship that's supposed to be manned by at least 6 people.

Luckily you still are in communication with your friend back at Command Base. Their expertise will help you get back home, if you can keep the ship intact for long enough...

*

In order to play this game properly, one player needs to play the spaceship side and the other Command. You'll also need a way to communicate with the other player, such as over Discord, or if you are in the same room, smoke signals like you normally would.

*

This is me and my brother's submission to the Game Off 2020 Jam with the theme of moonshot.

*

Update: Added more download options as some anit-virus programs doesn't like Game Maker games.
